message: Let's start with this.  I believe a 70/30 split is fair for me as the first proposer.
I think a 51/49 split is fairer, considering the money is losing value each round.  Let's get this done!
Bob, let's be reasonable. Your offer was too low considering the time pressure and inflation working against you. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share.
I'm willing to go up to 40/60, but I need a better deal than that to make this worthwhile.  Let's compromise and get this done before the money loses too much value.
